why: [The Smuggler] Truth is elusive. Pilate stood before 'Aletheia' and asked 'What is truth?' while facing it.
[The Patron] In the beginning was the Logos. The logic of the universe became a man.
[The Scribe] Zoe. This isn't biology; it's the quality of life from the Resurrection.
[The Patron] The subject of our mission. Every scroll leads back to the Theos.
